mapper.update: update FcubePlayer set Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HasLike = #{haslike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HasDisLike = #{hasdislike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HasGiveup = #{hasgiveup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HasExit = #{hasexit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PlayState = #{playstate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where idx = #{idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select idx, Cubeuuid, Uid, HasLike, HasDisLike, HasGiveup, HasExit, StartTime, PlayState from FcubePlayer
